cause.description:
There are too many sad and depressed people in our world and its partly because some of us are so unfriendly and uncaring! So basically it is our fault as much as it is theirs... so heres the plan...you listening? ok. Just smile. (even when you're really angry!) got it?! now do it....
....pLEASE
1. Everyone can smile and be happy.
cause.mission: encourage everyone to smile and be happy!
cause.name: Smile
